    Contact Us

    MAILAB NTNU

    Multimedia and Artificial Intelligence Lab at National Taiwan Normal University, focusing on computer vision, machine learning, and signal processing.

    • Taipei, Taiwan

    Get in Touch

    Lab Location

    Room 501, Technology Building
    Department of Electrical Engineering
    National Taiwan Normal University
    162, Section 1, Heping East Road
    Taipei 10610, Taiwan

    Email

    mailab@ntnu.edu.tw

    Phone

    +886-2-7749-3535

    Office Hours

    Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

    Collaborations & Partnerships

    We are open to collaborations with academic institutions, industry partners, and government organizations. If you're interested in working with us, please reach out via email with a brief description of the potential collaboration.

    Academic Collaborations

    Joint research projects, student exchanges, and shared publications with universities worldwide.

    Industry Partnerships

    Research sponsorships, technology transfer, and consulting services for companies developing AI technologies.

    International Networks

    Participation in international research networks, conferences, and workshops in our fields of expertise.

    Visit Our Lab

    We welcome visitors who are interested in our research. If you'd like to visit our lab, please email us in advance to schedule an appointment.

    Directions from MRT (Taipei Metro)

    From Guting Station (Green Line): Take Exit 2 and walk east on Heping East Road for about 10 minutes to reach the NTNU campus.

    From Technology Building Station (Brown Line): Take Exit 3 and walk south for about a 5-minute walk to reach the NTNU campus.
